name: Central Neuropathic Post-Thoracotomy Syndrome
chief_complaint: I have this burning, electric shock-like pain in my chest and back that won't go away since my lung surgery.
symptoms: Chronic burning pain along thoracotomy scar
physical_findings: Visible thoracotomy scar with surrounding dysesthesia
treatment: Cognitive behavioral therapy for pain coping
prognosis: Guarded - 40-60% achieve meaningful pain reduction with multimodal approach
description: A complex regional pain syndrome variant affecting 5-10% of post-thoracotomy patients, involving central sensitization and peripheral nerve injury. Characterized by disproportionate neuropathic pain beyond expected healing time.
